topics.title: Technology
topics.body: A place to share and discuss the latest developments, happenings and curiosities in the world of technology; a broad spectrum of conversation as to the innovations, aspirations, applications and machinations that define our age and shape our future.

1@247.body:
how are votes stored here?
did my (signed) vote get broadcast to all my neighbors and they forwarded those to their peers.
How are loops avoided? DAG architecture?

1@273.body: oh, no such thing as a "Topic" and then posts. Topics are posts. meh.
